history.title: The Beginning
history.description: Mitsukabose was founded near Hotarugaike Station, starting with a simple mission: to serve the best miso ramen in Osaka.

history.title: Expansion of Menu
history.description: We expanded our menu to include various types of miso ramen, introducing our signature red miso ramen that became an instant hit.

history.title: Miso Innovation
history.description: Developed our unique mixed miso blend, combining traditional techniques with modern innovation.

history.title: New Location
history.description: Relocated to our current location in the Airport Center Building, allowing us to serve more customers while maintaining our quality.

history.title: Looking Forward
history.description: Continuing our journey of serving authentic miso ramen while exploring new possibilities in Japanese cuisine.
